summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical underground distribution easements over portions of Highland Acres; Riverside Interurban Tracts; Jay Roberts country Club Estates; Sunnydale Gardens; Bagley's Addition; McAleer's Supplement to Seattle Homestead Addition; Section 1, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; 1st Addition to Lake forest Park; Section 19 Township 23 North; Range 4 East, W.M.; Loch-Gilvra Addition; as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
